content: or three around the stem of the pumpkin put the pumpkin in a small cellophane bag and tie with a ribbon add a greeting card if you desire and you have a cute happy fall gift pumpkin party 09292023 copyright lisa uotinen 2023 you are free to use this pattern to make and sell please credit tinker creek handknits in your listing d o not republish or distribute this pattern in any way thanks for purchasing an authorized copy of my pattern and not reproducing any part of it without my permission you are helping to support pattern 3 www tinkercreekhandknits org designers and makers thank you about me i m lisa uotinen i live in the beautiful blue ridge mountains near roanoke virginia my designs i like to write knitting patterns that are fairly simple with at least one or two fancy additions - cable stitches or colorwork for example i like to learn something mew with each pattern i write to expand my own knitting know-how i love to teach something that could be new to the knitters of my patterns ready to ship beanies i also make chunky beanies for babies toddlers kids and adults to ship anywhere in the u s see my website or etsy shop below pattern support go to my website listed below click contact for questions or comments or go to my etsy shop listed below and click contact underneath my profile picture my website www tinkercreekhandknits org join my newsletter receive free patterns news coupons and knitting goodness in your inbox every month sign up at www tinkercreekhandknits org etsy www tinkercreekhandknits com follow instagram @tinkercreekhandknits pinterest @lisauo pumpkin party v09292023 copyright lisa uotinen 2023 you are free to use this pattern to make and sell please credit tinker creek handknits in your listing www tinkercreekhandknits org d o not republish or distribute this pattern in any way thanks for purchasing an authorized copy of my pattern and not reproducing 6 any part of it without my permission you are helping to support pattern designers and makers
